job.title: ETL Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, cyberThink, Inc., is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<br><br>Role ETL Data Engineer Location Remote ndash Post Pandemic location will be Richardson TX. Duration 12+ Months Need minimum 10 Years of experience is mandatory Job Description 1. 9 to 10 years of data integration and data engineering experience doing hands-on ETL ELT development 2. Strong hands-on experience in Python, Spark, PySpark, Hive, Tez and Hadoop distributions preferably Cloudera and Google DataProc - MUST HAVE 3. Strong hands-on experience in SQL development and optimization ndash MUST HAVE 4. Experience in Google Cloud Platform cloud environment and Big query would be a plus
